content.description: ... Borja Andrés, from bilbao, fan of Barça, and living in Madrid
I studied Computer Engineering at ‘Universidad de Deusto’ (Bilbao) but, before this, I liked to build my own web pages (I'll tell you the thematic of these in private).​
Once I finished (2008), I decided to come to Madrid to work, with my girlfriend, until today ...
First I worked as a web developer in Virtual Software, doing things in back-end, front-end, related with databases, analysis, ... a bit of everything. Although primarily specializing in front

In January (2013) I joined the team of Upplication, as a front-end developer exclusively, with the responsability of choosing the architecture, frameworks, languages​​, ... to be used in this part but, when I can, I escape to the back-end or automation to play with nodejs or gruntjs.

Drink some beers in Bilbao with my girlfriend, friends, parents...
Barça fan. I'm from bilbao and fan of Barça. Mi father (former supporter of Athletic) still doesn't know what did he do badly with me.
